Reviews.Title: Not too bad
Reviews.Author: kcsnickers
Reviews.Content: did come nicely shipped. but had animal hair dog or cat and i'm highly allergic to dogs and cats.  So I had to really clean it good.other than that it runs just like my old one that broke.

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kysha Romney "justme"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement laptop for me and I would have given it 5 stars but from the moment I tried to use it the pin that connects to the charger seems to be loose and I have to do a lot to get the laptop to charge. Once it does charge it keeps a charge for a good while. But you first have to get it to charge. Other than that I would have given it 5 stars the laptop meets all other expectations for school and work. Speed and efficiency

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: I use my toshiba satellite l655 every single day and really love it. I have had to send it in and have modem replace after 60 days but was still covered under warrenty luckily, but other than that i have had no problems at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
320GB 5400RPM Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Mobile Intel HD Graphics
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit)
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite L655-S5096 15.6-Inch Laptop (Fusion Finish in Helios Black)
